snippet.title: Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror #3: The Little Devil | Official Game Teaser
snippet.description:
Pamali - The Little Devil is coming soon on Steam!

Pamali is an Indonesian folklore horror game where choices are a crucial factor in defining the journey you’ll experience. See how myth and taboos of Indonesian society shape the horror itself. 

In the third folklore, you’ll experience Putri’s struggle, a daughter who desperately needs money for her father’s medications. One day, after the death of her grandfather, she is informed that now she inherits all her grandfather’s wealth. She thinks that it’s the best way for her to get quick money so she decides to come to the grandfather’s mansion.Little did she know that a bigger mystery is haunted her in the mansion. 

Take a taste of Putri’s journey and help her decide her fate. The Little Devil is coming soon on Steam.

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/85...
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pamaligame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pamaligame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StoryTaleDev
